title: Prevention and vaccination
sitename: Prevention and vaccination : Oregon Health Authority
cleaned_text: An official website of the State of Oregon Learn How you know » (how to identify a Oregon.gov website) An official website of the State of Oregon » You are here: The mpox vaccine is free and its administration is covered by insurance. In addition, you will not be asked to provide any information or documentation of immigration status. Who should get the vaccine What to expect from the vaccine Search the table below for mpox vaccine events near you. If you have any questions about accommodations or need any assistance to participate please email: Community.Events@odhsoha.oregon.gov.
